code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a F student aged 22 yrs presents with Body Aches x 11 days. denies any alcohol use she denies smoking o:Height 62 in, Weight 203 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed SAVELLA - 50 mg 2x day, and ordered ANA.

content2.Unmatched: denies any alcohol use she denies

td.content: s:a 23 yo F student with Body Aches. she has had several such episodes over past 3 years. o:Height 62 in, Weight 208 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed LYRICA - 150 mg daily, and ordered ANA.
